citations.narrative:
The last documented review of the contingency plan was in October, 2022. The contingency plan must be reviewed, and
the review documented, on an annual basis to ensure that changes and updates are adequately evaluated and captured.
The facility must ensure that the annual review of the contingency plan is performed and documented.
Correct by 20 August 2024.

Multiple plates of food were present in the serval enclosure, but food on two paper plates in the enclosure had visible
growth of grey mold, and the stored cans of Zupreem carnivore diet were stamped by the manufacturer as best by 6/2024
(the seller's label stated the expiration date was 6/12/2024). Food that is contaminated and out of date may present a
health risk to the animal. The facility shall ensure that the serval diet is wholesome, nutritive, and uncontaminated.
Corrected at the time of inspection by removal of moldy food, and from this date forward 06 August 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.134(b) 
   
Contingency planning. 
The last documented review of the contingency plan was in October, 2022. The contingency plan must be reviewed, and 
the review documented, on an annual basis to ensure that changes and updates are adequately evaluated and captured. 
The facility must ensure that the annual review of the contingency plan is performed and documented. 
 
Correct by 20 August 2024. 
3.129(a) 
   
Feeding. 
Multiple plates of food were present in the serval enclosure, but food on two paper plates in the enclosure had visible 
growth of grey mold, and the stored cans of Zupreem carnivore diet were stamped by the manufacturer as best by 6/2024 
(the seller's label stated the expiration date was 6/12/2024). Food that is contaminated and out of date may present a 
health risk to the animal. The facility shall ensure that the serval diet is wholesome, nutritive, and uncontaminated. 
 
Corrected at the time of inspection by removal of moldy food, and from this date forward 06 August 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
